content: materials worsted weight yarn i used lion brand vanna s choice in scarlet red fern green and silver gray size h or i 5 5mm crochet hook i recommend an h hook but i couldn t find mine so i ended up using an i hook for the ones pictured tapestry needle poly fill fiber stuffing abbreviations magic_ring tutorial surface slip_stitch tutorial single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet decrease = single_crochet decrease double_crochet = double_crochet
